content:
You are here:

Manage Macros

Clone a macro to create a variant with slightly different instructions. Share macros with users, public groups, and more.

Clone Macros: Quickly copy a macro by cloning it.

Share Macros:
- In Salesforce Classic, share individual macros.
- In Lightning Experience, share macros using folders.

Search All Text Fields in Macros: Agents can search for keywords contained in a macroâ€™s text fields.
title: Managing Macros in Service Cloud
